description: Sixcell is the leading website design and development company in Bangladesh. They provide world-class services on web design and development, web application development, eCommerce website development, search engine optimization (SEO), and more.

Dhaka Startup is a trusted organization established with the aim of creating success in IT. Since its inception, Dhaka Startup has achieved multi-faceted success. The company provides all kinds of online solutions for your business.
